answerText: Parzival[10] Another work of Middle High German literature is this epic in which Hagen treacherously shoots Siegfried in the back after Kriemhild reveals his weakness.
heading: NASAT |2012 | 1 | 3 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This poem was based on an unfinished work of Chretien de Troyes. For 10 points each: [10] Name this medieval romance by Wolfram von Eschenbach about the son of Gamuret's quest for the Holy Grail.
